message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm looking to get a good deal, but I'm also interested in doing business with you.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
